summary: This is a March 5, 2021 email from the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, containing a monthly update attachment. It appears to be internal office communication regarding unit activities.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.role: Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of the email providing a monthly update from the U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York.

events.title: PCU Monthly Update Distribution
events.description: The Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit sends a monthly update email with an attached document titled 'PC_Unitr_Short_Form_Update.3.5.21.rd.docx'.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 5, 2021 regarding a Public Corruption Unit monthly update.
The communication originates from the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
An attachment titled 'PC_Unitr_Short_Form_Update.3.5.21.rd.docx' was included with the email.
